flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: I've been a programmer for the past 8 years and I really like it. I'm graduating on Computer Engineer and have written a lot of code by now. I think it's time for me to give something back to the coding comunity.
guide.introduction_rendered:
I've been a programmer for the past 8 years and I really like it. I'm graduating on Computer Engineer and have written a lot of code by now. I think it's time for me to give something back to the coding comunity.

guide.summary: This is a step by step guide on how to program in C programming language.

guide.title: How to program in C!
